screen.royalcrown.advisor.title: Advisor
button.royalcrown.advisor.intro3: Tell me what must be done
screen.royalcrown.advisor.intro1.text: Greetings, valiant traveler. I am the Royal Advisor to this colony.
screen.royalcrown.advisor.intro2.text: Rumor has reached mine ears of this new colony — and they say thou art its leader. Yet leadership is no crown.
screen.royalcrown.advisor.intro3.text: Ho, ho! Prudence. To seek the crown is the dream of many; few prove worthy of the Noble Title. Wilt thou be one of them?
screen.royalcrown.advisor.intro4.text:
To be crowned, thou must:
• Have at least %s citizens in the colony;
• Complete %s defenses near the colony.

Wilt thou prove thy worth?
screen.royalcrown.advisor.status.text:
Thou hast not yet proven thy worth. Return once thy tasks are complete!

Progress:
• Citizens: %s/%s
• Defenses: %s/%s
screen.royalcrown.advisor.claim1.text: Splendid! Thou hast shown thyself worthy to lead thy people as a true King.
screen.royalcrown.advisor.claim2.text: In the name of the Crown, I proclaim thee King!
screen.royalcrown.advisor.farewell1.text: Very well — for now my duty here is done, Your Majesty.
screen.royalcrown.advisor.farewell2.text: I shall return anon; till then, may this colony bloom into a Kingdom — yea, an Empire. Fare thee well!
screen.royalcrown.advisor.farewell3.text: This is no farewell, Your Majesty — only a brief parting.
msg.royalcrown.advisor.accepted: §bAdvisor: §fVery well! Prove thy worth and return to me.
msg.royalcrown.advisor.farewell.departed: The Advisor has departed on a journey of uncertain length, yet he shall keep in touch.
msg.royalcrown.advisor.prearrival: The Royal Advisor has heard tell of a new colony. He shall arrive shortly.
msg.royalcrown.advisor.arrived: The Advisor has arrived! Seek him near the Town Hall.
msg.royalcrown.ready: §6Trials complete! Speak with the §bRoyal Advisor§6 near the Town Hall to claim the Crown.
cmd.royalcrown.advisor.where.not_found: §bAdvisor: §fI found him not nearby. He oft lingers near the Town Hall.
